actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to restore the exclusion from determinations of annual income for purposes of eligibility for non-service-connected disability pensions amounts received from payments under Veterans' Administration life insurance policies.

summary.text: Excludes payments received under Veterans' Administration life insurance policies from annual income determinations for purposes of veterans' disability compensation eligibility.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to restore the exclusion from determinations of annual income for purposes of eligibility for non-service-connected disability pensions amounts received from payments under Veterans' Administration life insurance policies.
